form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Merkley (for himself and Mr. Udall) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration

form.official-title: Amending rule XXVIII of the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide for timely establishment of conference committees.

section.text: Rule XXVIII of the Standing Rules of the Senate is amended by striking paragraph 2(b) and inserting the following:

subsection.text: Consideration of a motion described in subparagraph (a), including consideration of any debatable motion or appeal in connection therewith, shall be limited to not more than 2 hours.
